Conversion of a user's activity log in built-in language

Dataprocessor is designed to convert the log of user actions in program at embedded language.

Processing allows you to convert specified files or directly entered text. Select the appropriate option in the switch "Convert".

Format program can be done in english or russian version embedded language. Default  language used from configuration. If necessary, generate the program in a different version, specify the required field "1C:Enterprise script language".

In the field "Main procedure name" specifies the name of procedure, that will be entry point to script.

If you plan to use generated procedure itself (e.g. in an external dataprocessor), it is possible to generate connection code to test client, by mark flag "To generate pairing code to client". Otherwise, for procedure will be created parameterTestingApplication, in which when you call will need to pass an existing object type TestApplication, which has already established connection with test client.

For readability of the resulting code generated by the program breaks at application "borders" windows to subroutines. If check box "Split scenario into procedures by application windows" there will be formed one large procedure.

Mark box "Get full object hierarchy" allows invocation of any object to generate obtaining all of parent test objects that are between current test object and form. If the check box is cleared - generated search for objects directly through object under test forms.
